column4: Well I am on 11.04 for now, so thought  I would try asking here.  I got a headset as of yesterday,  I can get the head phones working in the pink ports, but the  blue ports for the microphone, they don't seem to work at all.  I try the sound recorder program in Ubuntu/Gnome and nope not recording what I am saying.
I meant head phones in the blue ports above
pink,  blue whatever, eitgher way I can get the head phones working, but not the microphone
sure it isn't a hardware bug?
